data.name: Bagon
data.flavorText: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Bagon

attacks.name: Risky Kick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Dragon Eye
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: With its steel-hard stone head, it headbutts indiscriminately. This is because of the stress it feels at being unable to fly.

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Bagon.

data.name: Bagon

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

attacks.name: Risky Kick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Dragon Eye
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Granite Head
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Bagon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Bagon

attacks.name: Continuous Headbutt
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

data.name: Bagon

attacks.name: Leer
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Almost Flight
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

data.name: Bagon
data.flavorText: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Bagon.

data.name: Bagon

attacks.name: Scary Face
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

data.name: Bagon

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Bagon.

data.flavorText: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

data.name: Bagon

abilities.name: Star Barrier
abilities.text: As long as Bagon has any Energy attached to it, Bagon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Dragon Rage
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

data.name: Bagon

attacks.name: Rock Head
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 10 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: With its steel-hard stone head, it headbutts indiscriminately. This is because of the stress it feels at being unable to fly.

data.name: Bagon

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: With its steel-hard stone head, it headbutts indiscriminately. This is because of the stress it feels at being unable to fly.

data.name: Bagon
data.flavorText: Some theories suggest that its behavior of forcefully bashing its head into things stimulates cells that affect its evolution.

data.name: Bagon

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.
